channel.title: Django Beginner on Siddythings
channel.description: Recent content in Django Beginner on Siddythings

item.title: Serialization - Django REST framework| Ep. 02
item.description:
In this tutorial, we’ll be covering creating a simple Web API.

Along the way, it will introduce the various components that make up the REST framework and give you a comprehensive understanding of how everything fits together.

item.title: Your First Django Application | Ep. 01
item.description: In this part, you will be creating a simple REST application with minimum requirements. We’re going to use a virtual environment throughout this series of learning.
